description: Beginner Front End Devloper. My main interest is React but i happend to write in Node.js with MongoDB database. Additionaly i've had used TypeScript, Redux, Firebase and GraphQL. One of my main goals is reach senior level. Moving away from the topic of programming, in my free time i'm learning Japanese, i strive to be fluent in this language. In the future, i would like to learn Korean and Chinese as well.
